name: Hide and Seek 5100K
description:
In the future, the only way to escape constant surveillance is to participate in a global competition called SEEK & HIDE 5100.  Can you hide from the sentinels?

This is a jam game for A Game By It's Cover 2020

The game development is still in progress and feel free to post comments, bugs, and suggestions.

Please post a comment with your completion progress and times :)
